title: eppaDi yAn ariyEn
sahitya:
eppaDi yAn arivEn un mAyattai enner-iyambiDuvEn


anupallavi

  seppaDi viddai pOlE jagamellAm tOTri nI sheivadellAm sheidum sheyyAda rahasiyam


caraNam    siridinum siridAgap-peridinum peridAgit-tirbillA viyalbAgit-turiya param poruLAi
arivinukk-arivAgi Aruyirkk-uyirAgi AdhArAdhItanam aruT-perum jyOtiyE
